CommonDialogOption¶

class CommonDialogOption(value: DialogOptionValueType, context: sims4communitylib.dialogs.option_dialogs.options.common_dialog_option_context.CommonDialogOptionContext, on_chosen: Callable[[DialogOptionValueType], Any] = <function CommonFunctionUtils.noop>)¶

Bases: object

A option the player can choose within a dialog.

as_row(option_id: int) → ui.ui_dialog_picker.BasePickerRow¶

Convert the option into a picker row.

choose() → Any¶

Choose this option.

property context¶

The context of the option.

property description¶

The description of the option.

property icon¶

The icon of the option.

property on_chosen¶

The action to perform upon choosing this option.

property title¶

The title of the option.

property tooltip¶

The tooltip displayed to the player on hover.

property value¶

The value of the option.

CommonDialogOptionContext¶

class CommonDialogOptionContext(title_identifier: Union[int, str, protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString], description_identifier: Union[int, str, protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString], title_tokens: Iterator[Any] = (), description_tokens: Iterator[Any] = (), tooltip_text_identifier: Union[int, str, protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString] = None, tooltip_tokens: Tuple[Any] = (), icon: Any = None, is_enabled: bool = True, is_selected: bool = False)¶

Bases: object

A context used by CommonDialogOption that contains options for customization of the option.

property description¶

A description of what the dialog option does.

property icon¶

The icon displayed for this dialog option.

property is_enabled¶

Determine if the dialog option is enabled.

property is_selected¶

Determine if the dialog option is selected.

property title¶

The title of the dialog option.

property tooltip¶

The tooltip displayed to the player on hover.
